sqlMap.statement: SELECT EAIBZWKDSTCD AS "EAIBZWKDSTCD" , BZWKDSTICNAME AS "BZWKDSTICNAME" , TRACKASISKEY1NAME AS "TRACKASISKEY1NAME" , TRACKASISKEY2NAME AS "TRACKASISKEY2NAME" , BZWKDSTICDESC AS "BZWKDSTICDESC" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 WHERE EAIBZWKDSTCD = #eaiBzwkDstcd#

UPDATE $schemaId$.TSEAICM01 SET BZWKDSTICNAME = #bzwkDsticName#, TRACKASISKEY1NAME = #trackAsisKey1Name#, TRACKASISKEY2NAME = #trackAsisKey2Name#, BZWKDSTICDESC = #bzwkDsticDesc# WHERE EAIBZWKDSTCD = #eaiBzwkDstcd#

INSERT INTO $schemaId$.TSEAICM01( EAIBZWKDSTCD, BZWKDSTICNAME, TRACKASISKEY1NAME, TRACKASISKEY2NAME, BZWKDSTICDESC) VALUES(#eaiBzwkDstcd# ,#bzwkDsticName#, #trackAsisKey1Name#, #trackAsisKey2Name#, #bzwkDsticDesc# )
